text: There were at least four important battles fought in the vicinity of Kock, Poland: * Battle of Kock (1809) fought during the Napoleonic Wars * Battle of Kock (1920) fought during the Polishâ€“Soviet War * Battle of Kock (1939) during the German invasion of Poland * Battle of Kock (1944) fought during Operation Tempest (World War II)
title: Battle of Kock
